entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow near noon. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
